Summary: Brought in for their .NET technology with web interface expertise, the EffectiveSoft team quickly learned the specs needed and translated them into a complex application and customer portal.
EffectiveSoft provided developmental support for a mobile application. This included text minting and analysis features as well as social networking capabilities.

EffectiveSoft took on responsibility for a complete rebuild of an enterprise resource planning (ERP) program. While the system is still in alpha testing, the partnership is expected to continue in phase two of implementation.

Rewiewer: Senior Systems Analyst at Nissin Foods USA
Summary: EffectiveSoft provided developmental support of various web systems projects. This included an initial low-risk project to determine long-term viability of a working partnership.

Rewiewer: Chief Technology Officer at Medical Coding Software Company
Summary: EffectiveSoft provided backend coding and user interface development for a custom medical coding solutions platform. They held total responsibilty for development and design while incorporating third-party visual elements.

Rewiewer: Director of IT Strategy at Technology Company
Summary: EffectiveSoft provided development services for a number of internal systems including a back-end customer relationship management system and an accounting system.
EffectiveSoft provides backend development services for a telemedicine solution company. They work as part of the client's development team.
